query:
UPDATE
    exposure_file_view
SET
    view_key = (
        SELECT
            view_key
        FROM
            view_task_template
        WHERE id = (
            SELECT
                view_task_template_id
            FROM
                exposure_file_view
            WHERE
                exposure_file_view_task_id = (
                    SELECT
                        id
                    FROM
                        exposure_file_view_task
                    WHERE
                        task_id = ?1
                )
        )
    )
WHERE id = (
    SELECT
        id
    FROM
        exposure_file_view
    WHERE
        exposure_file_view_task_id = (
            SELECT
                id
            FROM
                exposure_file_view_task
            WHERE
                task_id = ?1
        )
)
